title: My Dearest Darling
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
All I need
Is someone like you
My dearest darling
Please love me too
Within my heart
I pray your answer's yes
I'll make your life
Full of happiness
[Chorus]
Whenever you need me
I'll be there by your side
I pledge my love to you
With God as our guide
[Verse 2]
Oh, nothing, nothing, nothing in this world
Can keep us apart
Ooh, my dearest darling
I offer you my heart
[Chorus]
Oh, yeah, whenever you need me
I, I'll be there by your side
Oh, I pledge my love to you
With God as our guide

[Verse 3]
Oh, nothing, nothing, nothing in this world
Can keep us apart
Ooh, my dearest darling
I'm offering you my heart
Ooh, my dearest darling
My, my dearest darlingâ€¦
